title: Aarya Emerald Radiance Stud Earrings
materials: Oval Cut Emeralds. Hyderabadi Polish. Gross Weight: 7.270 Gms
features: Exquisitely crafted stud earrings featuring a concentric circle design. A central oval-cut emerald is surrounded by sparkling round cut diamonds, creating a radiant floral effect. The setting is meticulously done in 18k yellow gold with intricate detailing that enhances the brilliance of both the emerald and diamonds. Features a unique cut-out design at the top for added visual appeal.
occasions: or special occasions such as Diwali celebrations
or evening parties. Adds a touch of elegance to both traditional and modern outfits.
description: These Aarya earrings are a testament to refined elegance. The combination of emeralds and diamonds creates a stunning contrast, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. Their versatile design makes them ideal for various occasions, offering a sophisticated touch to any ensemble. These studs are comfortable to wear and secure, ensuring you can enjoy their beauty worry-free.
